intro: A slimy dad on a gooey rescue mission!
description:
A lazy afternoon turns chaotic when a mysterious bucket sucks Gloop’s four mischievous kids into a vibrant, color-filled dimension. Now it's up to him—a lovable slime and single dad—to jump inside, master the art of color shifting, and rescue his quirky children!

Match Gloop’s color to the floors as you carefully navigate each stage. Watch your step, because touching the wrong color spells disaster! Shift between green, red, blue, and yellow by touching buckets filled with colorful ink to safely reach Gloop’s adorable kids and bring them back home.

Along the way, you’ll encounter tricky obstacles. Push boxes matching Gloop’s current color to climb higher platforms, and open locked doors by finding and activating levers of the correct color to advance your journey.

Ready to jump, splash, and slime your way through the ink dimension? Gloop’s family depends on you!

Features:
* Delightful 2D puzzle-platforming action
* Charming, colorful pixel-art visuals
* Color-changing mechanics
* 40 challenging levels
* Family-friendly story featuring lovable slime characters across numerous cutscenes
* Optional Time Rewind feature - fix your mistakes!
* Supports both 16:9 and 4:3 aspect ratio modes
* Optional CRT shader for retro visuals
